data.name: Wanderer of Teandria
data.detailed_description:
Patch 1.1!

  • new levels
  • updated sprites
  • bugfixes


About the Game

For centuries wanderers were traversing space an time to collect different rare artifacts, destroying dangerous ones and keeping helpful ones. One day a young man found mystical necklace and followed call of destiny…

Wanderer of Teandria is platformer where everything hides death. Bottomless pits, sharp traps, dangerous enemies, giant bosses and even platforms themselves will guide you trough dungeons, crypts, ruins and valleys of Teandria - mysterious kingdom, where everything is possible.

Key features:


  • Unique zones with dozens of levels
  • Gain new powers during your playthrough (for example, double jump or magic)
  • Defeat mighty bosses with help of your skill, tactic and reaction
  • Become the Wanderer and reveal your true destiny!

Wanderer of Teandria is challenging game with lots of secrets and bonuses. Search trough game levels, collect map fragments and open teleports to next areas. You have mysterious necklace that allows you open portals, but it will break with your deaths, so be careful and collect new crystals to succeed your mission.

Note: gamepad is strongly recommended

data.short_description: Wanderer of Teandria is challenging 2D platform game inspired by classic representatives of the genre. Find crystals and fragments of the map, avoid enemies and traps, and defeat giant bosses to succeed on the way to your destiny!
data.reviews:
“I would wait until there’s more features and improved gameplay but the gameplay is solid.”
Video Game Break

“It looks okay, and it also looks zoomed far out from the character themselves.”
Lost Video Games – Just another silly video game blog

3.63 – GameFAQs

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: 1.66 GHz (may work on lower specifications)
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB VRAM (may work on lower specifications)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 73 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: controller recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 147 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: controller recommended
